title: BRIEF-Silver Bull Halts Operations At The Sierra Mojada Project Due To Blockade
text:
BRIEF-Silver Bull Halts Operations At The Sierra Mojada Project Due To Blockade

Stock Markets 41 minutes ago (Sep 30, 2019 06:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Silver Bull Halts Operations At The Sierra Mojada Project Due To Blockade Sept 30 (Reuters) - Silver Bull Resources Inc : * SILVER BULL HALTS OPERATIONS AT THE SIERRA MOJADA PROJECT DUE TO BLOCKADE * SILVER BULL RESOURCES INC - ELECTED TO HALT ALL OPERATIONS ON SIERRA MOJADA PROJECT PROJECT UNTIL A RESOLUTION CAN BE FOUND * SILVER BULL RESOURCES INC - REMAINS COMMITTED TO GOOD FAITH DIALOGUE WITH MINEROS NORTEÑOS * SILVER BULL RESOURCES - DRILL CONTRACTOR AGREED TO CHARGE ZERO STANDBY FEE UNTIL ACCESS ISSUE IS RESOLVED

BRIEF-Silver Bull Halts Operations At The Sierra Mojada Project Due To Blockade
